commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basae43f5d"

diff:
"ae43f5d Bug 324397 - 'Allow cookies for the original site only' preference, should be selected by default p=Daniel Veditz <dveditz@cruzio.com> r=mconnor
diff --git a/browser/app/profile/firefox.js b/browser/app/profile/firefox.js
index 41e2530..36490be 100644
--- a/browser/app/profile/firefox.js
+++ b/browser/app/profile/firefox.js
@@ -335,7 +335,7 @@ pref("privacy.sanitize.promptOnSanitize", true);
 
 pref("network.proxy.share_proxy_settings",  false); // use the same proxy settings for all protocols
 
-pref("network.cookie.cookieBehavior",       0); // cookies enabled
+pref("network.cookie.cookieBehavior",       1); // 0-Accept, 1-dontAcceptForeign, 2-dontUse, 3-p3p
 pref("network.cookie.enableForCurrentSessionOnly", false);
 
 // l12n and i18n
"
